alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 2:58PM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Guadalupe River Near Bloomington affecting Calhoun, Victoria and Refugio Counties. For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria, Bloomington...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Guadalupe River Near Bloomington. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Irrigation and oil well pumps, tank batteries, and equipment in the lower flood plain below Victoria flood. Livestock are cut off, may have to be fed by boat, and could drown. Homes downstream above Highway 35 on the left bank are cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.19 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 26.1 feet Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.2 feet on 04/07/1992. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (4 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Guadalupe River Bloomington 20.0 10.1 Fri 8 am 20.1 24.8 26.1 26.0 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
